title: BAKAM Power Balloon Car Toy for Kids, Balloon Launcher Car Toys Set for Kids Science Toy, Inflatable STEM Balloon Pump Cars Racer Kit for Boys Girls (Black Bird)
features: AIR INERTIAL POWER TOY: Introducing this balloon launcher & powered car toy set. Your little one will enjoy endless fun from race car or flying rocket powered by balloon again and again. In the meantime, they will learn more some science and physics knowledge.

EDUCATIONAL STEM TOY: The balloon launcher set is suitable for boys and girls aged 3-6 years old to improve your child's observation and hands-on skills. It’s a good choice if you look for toys that encourage open-ended, active play and problem-solving.

RACING CAR & ROCKET MODE: There are two fun and educational projects that harness the power of thrust created by balloons. The air is expelled from the rear of the balloon creating thrust, so that the car can move fast and the rocket will fly. Using the balloon launcher car toy set, your kids can create numerous experiments and activities at home.

SAFETY & HIGH QUALITY: Made of ABS plastic, No Battery Needed, the balloon car kit is approved by CPSIA test, kids can play it safely. The balloon can be used over and over again until it either deteriorates or it bursts. The balloon pump is made of durable materials with a smooth surface, as shown in the picture, which will not harm toddler’s skin.

CHILD-PARENT INTERACTIVE TOY: Bring a little science fun into your playtime with your little angle! Kids can explore forces and motion with a these balloon-powered toy cars under the help of adults. It’s also a great classroom educational toy for teacher in school or kindergarten.
